video.title: Unskippable: Star Ocean: The Last Hope

captions.text: Unskippable!
Unskippable!
Okay, Star Ocean, bad times.
What are you guys doing in the toilet?
This is where we record.
Oh, well budge over, I'll join in.
Oh, okay.
Or 2064 AD.
Or 2064 AD.
Oh, well hey, we got plenty of time then. I'll probably be dead.
No worries.
Who would oppose the World Republic Federation? Isn't that like everyone?
Some global power's compensating for something?
I'm sorry, I was blinking. What happened?
They were entirely correct.
What a strange game. The only way to win is not to play at all.
Feel free to let go of my hand now.
Mutants!
But only in France.
If only Dr. Manhattan hadn't been being such an emo up on Mars, he could have stopped this.
As opposed to skyward to the ground?
Well, it is the greater United Nations.

Oh look we all about to die from radiation poisoning The first year of the new space date calendar Even calendars are better in space Thanks to the success of Professor Trillis Bakhtin warp drive experiments
I think I used some Trillis Bakhtin on my athlete's foot the other day.
The USTA secretly began to implement its...
It's a space nipple!
...the space reconnaissance force.
It's a good idea. Check up on space.
You never know what it's up to.
Take some pictures, too.
Space Date 10. At last. The first official SRF mission.
I hope that when it gets to the point that we're flying through space, we come up with something more creative than Space Date.
How about Star Date? How about-
Shut up!
This will be the start of our travels.
Heh. I bet they're rehashing all this stuff at the ceremony.
Oh, the economic downturn. Everybody's gotta narrate their own intro now.
That lady has a really deep voice.
Alright, guess I better be going.
Now that I've finished narrating that video game, back to work.
An arse is talking to me.
In the masturbation room.
Curses!
That little boy has a really high-pitched voice.
You're suffocating me!
Ya big baby.
Woohoohoo, that's what you sound like.
You're both twelve!
Must suppress urge to kill!
Why is he wearing his knees outside his legs?
Slash combat tutorial.
Well, this game wasn't gonna narrate itself.
Piggyback time, hop on!
But he's dead. Those bastards.
Well if you like him so much why don you go marry him
Bleh. Whoa. That would've been awesome if this was a 3D movie.
Which it's not, sadly.
It's all gone quiet.
Well, you can't hear anything in space, right?
Okay, I'll buy that.
Yeah, but there should at least be music. I mean, even 2001 had music.
Do do do do do.
Do do do do.
Do do do do.
Yes, we get it!
SRF 001 through 004, commencing auxiliary engine power adjustment.
Shut up, Steve.
You imbecile!
No, your mustache does that.
Hideo Kojima is very apologetic.
Oh! Beardo on the bridge!
What? Oh, we all wore the same outfit.
Alright, one of you guys has got to change, because I certainly am not.
Space Commander Stephen D. Kenny.
You bastards.
Reporting from Earth, sir.
Hurry this up, Kenny! I'm busting for a piss!
A rather leisurely return for the great Earth hero, Lightspeed Kenny, wouldn't you say?
Hey, only my wife can call me Lightspeed.
It hardly bodes well for the commander of such an important mission to miss his own departure ceremony.
My apologies, Deputy Director Shimada.
You fat sack of crap.
Is that a new ceiling light?
...with a superior of vast kindness and understanding, to have been assigned trivial duties at a time like this.
Oh snap!
Ice burn!
Very well I leave the rest to you I going to go and eat a stick of butter And I Commander Kenny apparently
I hope we get to kill him.
Hey, keep your fine dawn to yourself, buddy.
Sorry, what?
Sorry, who are you?
Especially with no pants.
Doesn't make me feel any better though.
I'd be doing sarcastic air quotes around there, but I'm too depressed.
Oh wow, you get the spaceship channel?
Well that was piss easy, I can't believe you get paid for this.
Oh sorry, you think it would be better if we had a bunch of stick figures and swearing on a yellow background?
There's a little bit more to it than that.
Whatever, your thing isn't any harder than ours. I'll prove it to you.
Bring it on, Junior.
Oh yeah? I will.
See you on Wednesday, small straight.
What?
Okay, in the game of Yahtzee, a small straight is when four dice line up sequentially.
I believe he was meaning it as an insult.
Oh really? Well, I think I gave his mum a small straight last night. And she loved it.
Unskippable!
